amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit funds authorized or otherwise made available to the Department of Defense for any fiscal year to be made available for closure or realignment of Marine Corps Recruit Depot, Parris Island.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 217 (Roll no. 257).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 217 (Roll no. 257).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
